TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RoleManagerSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class RoleManagerSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定義用於支援 Web 應用程式角色管理基礎結構的組態設定。

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the role management infrastructure of Web applications.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改的內容`roleManager`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `roleManager` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何以宣告方式指定的數個屬性的值類別。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二個示範如何使用型別。The second demonstrates how to use the type. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式指定的數個屬性的值類別。The following configuration file example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. 下表顯示的預設設定用於建構函式。The following table shows the default settings that are used for the constructor. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||".ASPXROLES"".ASPXROLES"| ||"/""/"| ||`All`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||30，以分鐘為單位30, in minutes| ||`false`| ||"AspNetSqlRoleProvider""AspNetSqlRoleProvider"| ||空字串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||2525|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CacheRolesInCookie { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示目前使用者的角色是否應存放在 Cookie 快取中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current user's roles are cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果目前使用者的角色在 Cookie 中快取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current user's roles are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回布林值，指出是否啟用 cookie 儲存的角色名稱。The property returns a Boolean value indicating whether cookie storage for role names is enabled. 當屬性設定為`true`在組態檔中，每個使用者角色資訊儲存在用戶端上的 cookie。When the property is set to `true` in the configuration file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie on the client. 角色管理會檢查以判斷使用者是否為特定角色，會檢查角色 cookie，然後再呼叫檢查資料來源的角色清單的角色提供者。When role management checks to determine whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before calling the role provider to check the list of roles at the data source. Cookie 會動態更新在用戶端快取最近驗證過的角色名稱。The cookie is dynamically updated on the client to cache the most recently validated role names. 您可以藉由指定快取在 cookie 中的角色名稱的可靠性來改善屬性，當您設定`roleManager`組態檔區段。You can improve the reliability of the role names that are cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure the `roleManager` section of the configuration file. 預設值屬性是`All`，它會加密在 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。The default property is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookieName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 快取存放角色名稱所使用的 Cookie 名稱。

span.span: The name of the cookie used to cache role names.
The default is ".ASPXROLES".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回快取角色名稱 cookie 的名稱。The property returns the name of the cookie that is used to cache role names. 您也可以設定您的應用程式指定的角色是否快取的 cookie 名稱`cookieName`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。You can specify the name of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieName` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 當您想要唯一識別您的應用程式的 cookie 或多個應用程式共用 cookie 時，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to uniquely identify a cookie for your application or when a cookie is shared across multiple applications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookiePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 虛擬路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path of the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 存放角色名稱所使用的 Cookie 路徑。

span.span: The path of the cookie used to store role names.
The default is "/".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以設定您的應用程式指定會在快取角色名稱 cookie 的路徑`cookiePath`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。You can specify the path of the cookie where role names are cached for your application by setting the `cookiePath` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 屬性傳回的值`cookiePath`Web.config 檔案中的屬性。The property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file. 路徑不區分大小寫。The path is case sensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Security::CookieProtection CookieProtection { System::Web::Security::CookieProtection get(); void set(System::Web::Security::CookieProtection value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定安全類型，用於保護快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of security that is used to protect the cookie that caches role names.

value.span: 快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 內所使用的安全保護類型。

span.span: The type of security protection used within the cookie where role names are cached.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會描述如何安全地儲存在 cookie 中的資訊。The property describes how information in a cookie is securely stored. 您也可以設定您的應用程式指定的角色是否快取的 cookie 的安全性類型`cookieProtection`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。You can specify the security type of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieProtection` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. `cookieProtection`屬性會採用列舉值`All`， `Encryption`， `None`，或`Validation`。The `cookieProtection` attribute takes a enumeration value of `All`, `Encryption`, `None`, or `Validation`. 預設值為 `All`。The default is `All`. 確定使用的預設值為屬性，如果您想要資料驗證和加密來協助保護 cookie。Be sure to use the default value for the property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie. 若要改善您的 cookie 保護，您也可以設定屬性`true`。To improve the protection of your cookie, you can also set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieRequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 是否需要 Secure Socket Layer (SSL) 連線才能傳回伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cookie that is used to cache role names requires a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection in order to be returned to the server.

value.span: 如果需要用 SSL 連線才能將快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 傳回伺服器則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is needed in order to return to the server the cookie where role names are cached; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定要藉由設定傳回至伺服器的角色名稱 cookie 是否需要 SSL `cookieRequireSSL` ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。You can specify whether SSL is required to return the role names cookie to the server by setting the `cookieRequireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieSlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 是否會定期重設。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cookie that is used to cache role names will be reset periodically.

value.span: 如果要定期重設角色名稱 Cookie 的到期日和時間，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the role names cookie expiration date and time will be reset periodically; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定用來快取角色名稱 cookie 是否定期重設或在固定的時間點過期的時間使用`cookieSlidingExpiration`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。You can specify whether the cookie that is used to cache role names is periodically reset or expired at a fixed point in time by using the `cookieSlidingExpiration` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如果`true`，cookie 到期日一開始會設定為目前的日期和時間加上屬性，以分鐘為單位。If `true`, the cookie expiration is initially set to the current date and time plus the property, in minutes. 當使用者繼續主動使用 ASP.NET 應用程式時的到期日期和時間的 cookie 會自動重新整理，如果沒有不超過一半的剩餘。While the user continues to actively use the ASP.NET application, the expiration date and time of the cookie is automatically refreshed, if there is less than half of the remaining. 預設值為 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan CookieTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 還有多少分鐘之後就算到期。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of minutes before the cookie that is used to cache role names expires.

value.span: ，表示用於快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 還有多少分鐘之後就算到期。

span.span: A that is the number of minutes before the cookie used to cache role names expires.
The default is 30, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定值，指定角色名稱 cookie 過期前的分鐘數。The property sets a value specifying the number of minutes before the role names cookie expires. 預設值是 30 分鐘。The default is 30 minutes. 如果屬性是`false`、屬性會被忽略。If the property is `false`, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CreatePersistentCookie { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 代表要用工作階段 Cookie 或永續性 Cookie 快取存放角色名稱。

span.span: Indicates whether a session-based cookie or a persistent cookie is used to cache role names.

value.span: 如果角色名稱 Cookie 是永續的，在各個瀏覽器工作階段中都有效則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to make the role names cookie persistent across browser sessions; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出用來快取角色名稱 cookie 是否應為工作階段為基礎的 cookie，這表示瀏覽器關閉時，會遺失 cookie 或永續性 cookie，這表示，cookie 會跨可用瀏覽器工作階段。The property indicates whether or not the cookie that is used to cache role names should be a session-based cookie, which means that the cookie is lost when the browser is closed, or a persistent cookie, which means that the cookie is available across browser sessions. 預設值是`false`，表示工作階段為基礎的 cookie 用來快取角色名稱。The default is `false`, which indicates that a session-based cookie is used to cache role names. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultProvider { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來管理角色的預設提供者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the default provider that is used to manage roles.
The name of a provider in the .
The default is "AspNetSqlRoleProvider".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須符合在一個具名的值`providers`小節的`roleManager`組態檔區段。The property must match a named value in the `providers` subsection of the `roleManager` section of a configuration file. 空字串 ("") 不是有效的值屬性。An empty string ("") is not a valid value for the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於快取存放角色名稱的 Cookie 其關聯的網域名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the domain that is associated with the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 快取存放角色名稱所使用之 Cookie 的 。

span.span: The of the cookie used to cache role names.
The default is an empty string ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，會使用來設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態中`domain`屬性`roleManager`組態項目。The property is set in the configuration for an ASP.NET application by using the `domain` attribute of the `roleManager` configuration element. 如果未指定值的組態中`domain`屬性屬性會傳回`null`角色名稱 cookie 網域的預設值的行為和屬性。If no value is specified in the configuration for the `domain` attribute, the property returns `null` and the role names cookie domain defaults to the behavior of the property. 預設為空字串。The default is an empty string.

span.span: if the ASP.NET role management feature is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回布林值，指出是否可以在執行階段存取 ASP.NET 角色管理功能。The property returns a Boolean value indicating whether or not the ASP.NET role management feature can be accessed at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxCachedResults { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ASP.NET 在角色 Cookie 中快取存放的角色數量上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of roles that ASP.NET caches in the role cookie.

value.span: ASP.NET 在角色 Cookie 中快取存放的角色數量上限值。

span.span: A value indicating the maximum number of roles ASP.NET caches in the role cookie.
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回一個整數，表示 ASP.NET 會在角色 cookie 中快取的角色數目上限。The property returns an integer indicating the maximum number of roles that ASP.NET caches in the role cookie. 預設值為 25。The default is 25.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
Public ReadOnly Property Providers As ProviderSettingsCollection

summary.span: 取得 項目的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object of elements.

value.span: 含有提供者設定的 ，這些設定是在組態檔案 區段的 子區段內定義的。

span.span: A that contains the providers settings defined within the subsection of the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色管理提供者會提供網站的存取權的角色類型的元件。Role management providers are components that provide access to the types of roles for a site. 您可以指定角色中的管理提供者`providers`小節的`roleManager`組態檔區段。You can specify role management providers in the `providers` subsection of the `roleManager` section of a configuration file. 屬性指定預設使用的提供者。The property specifies the provider that is used by default. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#13)]
